muclient.script:
internalrevision = "$Rev$"
dofile (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID (), 20) .. "luapath.lua")
require "var" require "serialize" require "commas" require "pluginhelper" require "verify" require "tprint" require "ldplugin" require "aarddb"
aarddb = Aarddb:new{}
function planeslookup(mob) return aarddb:planeslookup(mob) end
function cmd_find(cmddict) local mob = cmddict[1] if mob then mobs = planeslookup(mob) phelper:plugin_header('Planes Mobs') if next(mobs) then local tformat = '%-30s %-16s %-5s' ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format(tformat, 'Name', 'Pool', 'Pool#')) ColourNote("white", "black", "-----------------------------------------------------------------------") for i,v in ipairs(mobs) do ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", string.format(tformat, v['mobname'], v['poollayer'], v['poolnum'])) end else ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", 'None') end Note("") else phelper:plugin_header('find') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " find mob") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "lookup mobs in the planes") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) argument 1 is the mob to find") end end
function cmd_reset(cmddict) if cmddict[1] == 'help' then phelper:plugin_header('reset') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " mreset") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "reset the planesmobs tables") else aarddb:resetplanestable() phelper:plugin_header('mreset') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Reset the tables") end end

phelper:set_default('cmd', 'plookup') phelper:set_default('plugin_colour', 'red')
phelper:add_cmd('find', {func=cmd_find, help="find a planes mob", default=true}) phelper:add_cmd('mreset', {func=cmd_reset, help="reset planesmobs table"})
phelper:enable()
